an4.274:1.1: “For insight into greed, four things should be developed.
an4.274:1.3: Firstly, a mendicant meditates by observing an aspect of the body—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of covetousness and displeasure for the world.
an4.274:1.4: They meditate observing an aspect of feelings … mind … principles—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of covetousness and displeasure for the world.
an4.274:1.5: For insight into greed, these four things should be developed.”
